name: Moments By Moments
description:
This is Moments By Moments, a 2D physics platformer. Created for the NSCC 2880 game jam, and then further refined. We won the game jam and Xona Game's Best of NSCC 2880 award.

Art - Snarkfowl

Programming - The Affronted

Time only moves when you do. You also have the ability to go through portals and invert gravity.

Supports Keyboard and Mouse, as well as Controller.
